# 三、学到的东西
## 1.ISCTF
### Crypto
#### 七七的欧拉
解题人：g0ubu1i分解n后发现为某数的次方![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2023/png/39265092/1700746031028-39b27db3-49cf-4f8f-8809-9b8278b21500.png#averageHue=%23e5e5e4&clientId=u6b7437f4-3890-4&from=paste&height=103&id=uf8c3021f&originHeight=185&originWidth=1520&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&size=29964&status=done&style=none&taskId=u3739fd7a-b925-4da1-b482-b8cd636fcfb&title=&width=844.4444108892384#averageHue=%23e5e5e4&from=url&id=fq8AP&originHeight=185&originWidth=1520&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)根据欧拉定理，phi=p**8 - p**7，求得d解出题
```
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from gmpy2 import *

e=8401285423075497989963572888601376313375827722858883767564499066473101615084214973041844878664837606157257039358849583049856161628241418012475432529735909


p = 

phi = p**8 - p**7
d = gmpy2.invert(e,phi)
print(long_to_bytes(pow(c,d,n)))
```
![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2023/png/39265092/1700997337918-38b1d65e-6691-4a8a-b510-9345626907f3.png#averageHue=%23c5bf7b&clientId=uc1ee79bf-b76a-4&from=paste&height=105&id=u14265c74&originHeight=189&originWidth=1608&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&size=73345&status=done&style=none&taskId=ufbcfc249-bf42-4922-85ec-a1fbd77ba19&title=&width=893.3332978354574#averageHue=%23c5bf7b&from=url&id=Ks2PE&originHeight=189&originWidth=1608&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)

#### easy_rsa
解题人：g0ubu1i获取附件后nc连接，得到pqec，编写脚本求m
```
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from gmpy2 import *



e=65537


d = inverse(e, (p-1)*(q-1))
print(long_to_bytes(pow(c, d, p*q)))
```
得到flag![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2023/png/39265092/1700995961287-6dd5b7d8-8442-4eaa-9d00-1773397afef2.png#averageHue=%23c6ba6d&clientId=uc1ee79bf-b76a-4&from=paste&height=62&id=ueb20a2d5&originHeight=112&originWidth=1211&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&size=36898&status=done&style=none&taskId=ub2ba63f5-8574-45b7-b716-8f97f6543ba&title=&width=672.7777510439919#averageHue=%23c6ba6d&from=url&id=HY1Th&originHeight=112&originWidth=1211&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)
#### rsa_d
解题人：g0ubu1inc连接靶机后要求计算d写脚本
```
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from gmpy2 import *

p=43625867
q=5050993
e=65537

d = inverse(e, (p-1)*(q-1))
print(d)
```
![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2023/png/39265092/1700996192309-5bb7499b-7e2b-4291-beec-f0e0d43696f1.png#averageHue=%232a2c36&clientId=uc1ee79bf-b76a-4&from=paste&height=203&id=u9c2737a7&originHeight=365&originWidth=891&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&size=140985&status=done&style=none&taskId=uc8d94884-665c-45a8-8a73-938dd1d3dd7&title=&width=494.999980330468#averageHue=%232a2c36&from=url&id=BPbzF&originHeight=365&originWidth=891&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)
#### ezRSA(τ)
解题人：g0ubu1i
##### step1:
```
def step1(m):
    p,q = getPrime(1024),getPrime(1024)
    n=p*q
    e=getPrime(512)
    phi = (p-1)*(q-1)
    while gcd(e,phi) != 1:
        e=getPrime(512)
    d = pow(e,-1,phi)
    k = randint(800,1500)
    f = factor(k)
    # print(f"\n\n\n\n{k=}\n\n\n\n")
    leak = (pow(e, 2) + (e*d - 1)*f)*getPrime(256) + k  # (e**2 + (e*d-1)*k!)*x + k 
    print(f"{n=}")
    print(f"{leak=}")
    e = 65537
    c = pow(m,e,n)
    return c
```
根据output.txt我们有n，c，leak，而leak等于![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/__latex/3011dd7c7fb1be06026dcfd5f4dd1514.svg#card=math&code=leak %3D (pow(e%2C2)%2B(e^d - 1)*f)*getPrime(256) %2B k&id=ReRjY#from=url&id=zsIVD&originHeight=29&originWidth=484&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)且phi = e**d - 1，f为k的阶乘由于给定的k的范围比较小，所以可以爆破k。给leak%f后得到**![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/__latex/c659954e3100608cbfff9c24e6fff3b8.svg#card=math&code=\begin{equation} leak \equiv e^2 *s %2Bk \pmod f\\ \end{equation}&id=OYZvC#from=url&id=WAhzd&originHeight=50&originWidth=316&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/__latex/e5e7a65596a06bbd5c722ba70be44d62.svg#card=math&code=e^2*s %3D (leak-k)%f&id=zXCWo#from=url&id=OMKvT&originHeight=29&originWidth=167&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)**由此确定e**2_s为1280位且不是素数由推导_![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/__latex/71899756fe6ef8b1aeeceba98bf145e7.svg#card=math&code=\begin{aligned} leak %26%3D e^2*s %2B t*\varphi(n) *s \\ phis%3Dleak - e^2*s%26 %3D t*\varphi(n) *s \\ \therefore s %26%3D gcd(e^2*s%2Cphis) \end{aligned}&id=dPb7T#from=url&id=UUHKK&originHeight=86&originWidth=382&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)_由此确定e**2_s为1280位且不是素数由上述条件可得到确定e的条件，写代码
```
for k in range(800, 1042):
    f = int(factor(k))
    e2_s = (leak-k) % int(f)
    phis = (leak -k - e2_s) // f 

    s = GCD(tphi,e2_s)
    if e2s.bit_length() == 1280 and isPrime(e2s)==False and s.bit_length()>=255:
        print(k)
        print(s)
```
即可得到k，s，继续推导可得到phi与e![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/__latex/ffac15aa0bf092af33c5dde483eaef50.svg#card=math&code=e %3D iroot(e2_s %2F%2Fs%2C2)[0]\\ phi %3D phis %2F%2F s&id=Dox8o#from=url&id=CBzmz&originHeight=56&originWidth=900&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)由此解出第一部分
##### step2：
首先考察LCG算法，由LCG算法恢复出p
```
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from random import randint,getrandbits
from sympy import factorial as factor
from gmpy2 import is_prime as is_strongPrime
from gmpy2 import gcd
from libnum import s2n

from Crypto.Util.number import *
def gcd(a,b): 
    if(b==0): 
        return a 
    else: 
        return gcd(b,a%b) 
leak2 =  [362437850887271063413256292444148642949623196635276044583204094265607936120337004605360832421011, 1932915843524327487337992118762711929552569713433223514001673251237692307587356544615955431611435994003602897830069566867051943572065473955405337889221398, 11222178024143398739150445814520244630341642052876364179793404105841311693968292227072031763726153574031884490677131749512430325919668649359617953965112844, 5408933876805830533113961512210040977462510675785228477646978801328722923647434079128879371684477664804744431834418916837956820965870203842552250165916773, 1447143741705069323823257922715038721270982554690635708441585728089036094805730054505696492295730683300002193478561819037345041940787115528445592303142510, 3707657531268843465369646969917923274507341341483950204025637357600814449263032574496424566705812439915548150679438579110456264431525526309588664326456861, 9263925820149827740182684692442727161206242182976684575667062235695526783971703826794731732152445051579616121306722939129265340347908823003172137299057843, 207494591333501391015462321304802957885928775185602834554977737560856036337667840127810136802887548047878444936730742505483927963807357904024967768148122, 7052936859446617933917872361389151092893299250603966165472023802877016733939957851026719428770748111897050866474067880613419756475700748999497496482278608, 1169538791889404037461397919075674424569430764451305755000680272926397357803359328850780774937432248011264334398346178303234064891680342161511829008635621]
t = []
for i in range(9):
    t.append(leak2[i]-leak2[i-1]) 
all_n = []
for i in range(7):
    all_n.append(gcd((t[i+1]*t[i-1]-t[i]*t[i]), (t[i+2]*t[i]-t[i+1]*t[i+1]))) 

MMI = lambda A, n,s=1,t=0,N=0: (n < 2 and t%N or MMI(n, A%n, t, s-A//n*t, N or n),-1)[n<1] #逆元计算
for p in all_n:
    p=abs(p)
    if p==1:
        continue
    a=(leak2[2]-leak2[1])*MMI((leak2[1]-leak2[0]),p)%p
    ani=MMI(a,p)
    b=(leak2[1]-a*leak2[0])%p
    seed = (ani*(leak2[0]-b))%p
    plaintext=seed
    q = n // p
    if plaintext.bit_length() >= 63 and leak1-p-q==0:
        #continue
        print(a)
        print(b)
        print(p)
        print(seed)
```
通过得到的a，b，seed重新计算seed
```
a = 77103936782340200964969557381530979461498267151335748569651214009683718895787
b = 80415964905483336441916158760498483436647287707097172421898625062076211518999
seed = 4700640019334050676
leak2 = []
for i in range(10):
    leak2.append(seed := (seed * a + b) % p)
seed = (seed * a + b) % p
```
接着爆破key得到key
```
for key in trange(60000000+1,10**8 //2+1,-2):
    if is_prime(key) and not is_strongPrime(key):
        print(key)
        break
```
拿到key后可求得base，通过final求得c，求解c得到后半段密文
```
key = 56052361
base = key ^ seed
e=0x10001
d = inverse(e,(p-1)*(q-1))
final = [2268617516274900905319941795987877533673889507146326516564545408684476960310333170888941124460992562245780101836116975666368936099249664924148379487909122, 1445275952377746701088629016221431744592935398639655895336779954310077866709012082302847692239730041591520169244063854849129773530127510048494782550102381, 7]
c = 0
u = 0
for i in final:
    c += final * (base ** u)
    u += 1
print(long_to_bytes(pow(c,d,n)))
```
![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2023/png/39265092/1701250671509-3b14c83a-aeb2-44aa-a4e5-f60c02777d48.png#averageHue=%2332302e&clientId=u1c6995b6-8d83-4&from=paste&height=147&id=ua5661061&originHeight=265&originWidth=561&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&size=38249&status=done&style=none&taskId=u1e07c220-f2e4-4f33-903f-47446620b98&title=&width=311.6666542821465#averageHue=%2332302e&from=url&id=gfKEj&originHeight=265&originWidth=561&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)
#### signin
解题人：g0ubu1i考点：Schmidt-Samoa密码系统
```
from Crypto.Util.number import *

c = 
N = 
d = 
l = pow(2,N*d,N)-2
x=GCD(N,pow(2,l))
print(long_to_bytes(pow(c,d,x)))
```
得到flag![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2023/png/39265092/1701084819968-981a6332-2391-4265-9e2c-027884fcbb54.png#averageHue=%23c7d46e&clientId=uc3c77ab4-f351-4&from=paste&height=71&id=uc75a8d9e&originHeight=128&originWidth=857&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&size=32377&status=done&style=none&taskId=u8b7fb70d-4813-4ca3-8a20-6ef852dc151&title=&width=476.1110921921561#averageHue=%23c7d46e&from=url&id=cxWQU&originHeight=128&originWidth=857&originalType=binary&ratio=1.8000000715255737&rotation=0&showTitle=false&status=done&style=none&title=)
## 
 2.密码学
#### (1)Schmidt-Samoa密码系统
与RSA相似，
![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/__latex/3afa651aa1841679fd11e43054608efe.svg#card=math&code=N%20%3D%20p%5E2%20%2Aq%5C%5C%0Aphi%20%3D%20p%2A%28p-1%29%2A%28q-1%29%5C%5C%0Ad%20%3D%20inverse%28N%2Cphi%29%5C%5C%0A%0A&id=wjmak)

解题脚本
```python
from gmpy2 import*
from libnum import*

N =  …………
#N = p^2*q
d = …………
c = ……
pq = gcd(pow(2,d*N,N)-2,N)
m = pow(c,d,pq)
print(n2s(m))
```
## 3.信息安全数学基础
### 定义 
#### 1.1.1
设a，b为任意两个整数，其中b≠0，若存在一个整数q使得等式
![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/__latex/4258eb7cf76da244475ea09713ce68a9.svg#card=math&code=a%20%3D%20q%2Ab&id=uhQ7i)
成立，则称b整除a或者a被b整除，记作b|a，并把b叫做a的因数，a叫做b的倍数，人们常将q写作a//b或，否则，就成b不能整除a，或者a不能被b整除，记作b∤a
注：（1）当b遍历a的所有因数时，-b也遍历a的所有因数。
 （2）当b遍历a的所有因数时，a//b也遍历a的所有因数。
#### 1.1.2
设整数n≠0，±1，如果除了显然因数±1和±n外，n没有其他因数，那么，n就叫做素数（或质数或不可约数），否则，n就叫做合数。当整数n≠0，±1时，n和-n同为素数和合数。因此，在没有特别声明的情况下，素数总是指正整数，通常写作p。
### 定理
#### 1.1.1
设a，b≠0，c≠0是三个整数，若b|a，c|b，则c|a。
#### 1.1.2
设a，b，c≠0是三个整数，若c|a，c|b，则c|a±b。
### 1.1.3
设a，b，c是三个整数，若c|a，c|b，则对任意整数s，t，有c|（s*a+t*b）。
#### 1.1.4
由定理1.1.3推广为多个整数的线性组合
设整数c≠0，若整数a1，……，an都是整数c的倍数，则对任意n个整数s1，……sn，整数s1*a1+……+sn*an，是c的倍数
#### 1.1.5
设a，b都是非0整数，若a|b，b|a，则a = ±b。
#### 1.1.6
设n为一个正合数，p为n的一个大于1的最小正因数，则p一定是素数，且
![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/__latex/cc487076eed34bdeead8a5491112c452.svg#card=math&code=p%20%E2%89%A4iroot%28n%2C2%29&id=WB1NV)
注 （1）定理1.1.6表明，素数为乘法的最小单元，并且整数可以表示为素数的乘积
#### 1.1.7
设n是正整数，如果对所有素数 p ≤ iroot（n，2），都有p∤n，则n一定是素数。
#### 1.1.8
素数有无穷多个
### 厄拉托塞师筛法
对任意给定的正整数N，要求出所有不超过N的素数，列出N个整数，从中删除不大于iroot（N，2）的所有素数p1，p2，……，pk的倍数（ 除素数p1，p2……），余下的整数（不包括1），就是所要求的不超过N的素数。
